name: Range.setEndBefore
description: The Range.setEndBefore() method sets the end position of a Range relative to another Node. The parent Node of end of the Range will be the same as that for the referenceNode.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Traversal and Range Specification
